title: Kabbalah, Corona and the Search for Self: Navigating the Chaos to find the Treasures.
description:
Annette Poizner, Psychotherapist, Clinical Social Worker, Hypnotherapist and Handwriting Expert from Canada, joins me to talk Corona and what ancient wisdom and Jordan Peterson have to teach us about how to deal with chaos. Pertinent links here, and notes on the conversation will follow the links.

Website for Lobster University Press & Annette's work: ap.annettepoizner.com
YouTube animations for Lobster University Press:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtYM0moZgcQ0dbpy7gUWr_w
Facebook Page for Lobster University Press
https://www.facebook.com/lobsteruniversitypress/?modal=admin_todo_tour
Blogs:
https://blogs.timesofisrael.com/author/annette-poizner/
https://medium.com/@annettepoizner

Print copy of From Chaos to Order: A Guide to Jordan Peterson's 
Worldview
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1989824080
Digital versions of her books:  Chaos and Order by Annette Poizner on Kobo: https://www.kobo.com/us/en/search?query=Annette+Poizner
On negative space: Seminal Words & the Pregnant Pause
https://blogs.timesofisrael.com/seminal-words-and-the-pregnant-pause/
-- 
Earlier conversation with Annette:  Restructuring Your Reality, Lobster University Press and Absorbing Jordan B. Peterson:  https://youtu.be/SMBlzx-tg08
The Meaning Code - all conversations: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ/videos?view_as=subscriber
Structure and Flexibility conversation with Jeremy Firth:
https://youtu.be/6IfWU3zQRjI
Data Compression Conversations with Michael: 
The Data Compression Lens, Tokens, Propaganda, Information Entropy and Meaning:  https://youtu.be/gbmm3l9HP4Q
A Tiny Piece of Code Melts the World:  https://youtu.be/UPjG1pGsH4E
Error Correction Mechanism:  https://youtu.be/rH24Hth58dE
Is Chaos the Antidote to Chaos? https://youtu.be/XLYQmknDCQQ

Can we learn something from ancient Jewish wisdom about what is happening to the world via the coronavirus pandemic?
Biblical Hebrew is a pictographic language system with 22 letters, each of which represents a concept. The name of the letter as well as the sound represents a concept. It is a meaningful language.
The consonants that represent Pestilence can be placed with different vowels and that would create three different words/meanings. Those 3 words are Dever (pestilence), Davar (thing/the material world), 
Deebare (speech).
In Hebrew, a word and the thing itself are the same thing.
We are made in the image of God and God speaks the world into being.
When God blows into the nose of Adam, He is purveying the capacity for speech. The breath is the speech.
Do words matter? Are words matter? If words don't matter, what matters?
Secular v. spiritual mentality - words are things and they're kept fresh by how we speak them, and in this way, we keep the material world fresh.
In recent decades, our speech has become eroded.
Old proverb: He who is kind when he should be cruel will be
cruel when he should be kind. Miriam was quarantined because of how she spoke about Moses. We have begun to use empty speech for all forms of expression, even intimacy. Empty speech - fake experts.
But Jordan Peterson came on to the scene and for two years taught us what speech can be. Choose your words. You can make them a banquet or you can let them be nothing more than crumbs.
Speech has been so degraded, crudities spewing out of their mouths.
And now, we have become concerned with what else is spewing out of people's mouths. We are wearing face masks to protect us from what is pouring out of the mouths of others.
By learning hypnosis, Ms. Poizner became imprinted with the verbal style of the practitioner who trained her. By hemming yourself in, by sacrifice and self-discipline, you are clearing your channel and making space for creativity.
Let's clear the air. We've cleaned our rooms. Let's clean our speech.
Not just precision of speech, but purity of speech. Gratitude, elevated speech.
The search for self:
Inner v. outer
Yin v. Yang
These must be balanced
Those who get sick are those whose inner and outer are not balanced, where there is a rift creating a capacity for invasion.
Old Jewish saying:  God creates the cure before he creates the illness.
Chaos v. Order
Right Brain v. Left Brain
Affiliation v. inhibition
Attraction v. Retraction
We need both sides to achieve mastery
What confounds the map of reality? What is the psychologicall significance
 of the God ideal? What is the meta map of reality?
Not a world of things but a world of values.
the Kabbalah looks for clues in Hebrew words to find intrinsic patterns to find the unity.
We recalibrate. A system of character refinement.

https://karenwongart.com
